title: WELCOME TO COJAM
text:
We let headphone users easily communicate with peers & friends and vice versa.

 Music & podcasts enhance your life and it’s about time we listen to them without hurting our communication!

title: HEAR THE OUTSIDE WITH HEADPHONES ON
text:
Tap your picture and sound from the outside amplifies through your headphones.

You’ll comfortably hear the outside without taking your headphones off or pausing your music, and you'll hear much clearer than you would with your naked ear.

title: FIND YOUR PERFECT SOUND MIX
text:
Easily adjust the music to outside sound volume to find your perfect mix.

1.Use the volume buttons on the side of the phone to adjust how low you want the music to be.

2. Use the slide bar in SETTINGS to adjust how loud you want to hear the world around you. That's it!

title: EASILY INVITE OTHERS TO COJAM
text:
Does CoJam make you use your headphones better and longer throughout your day?

 Click the share button straight from the main screen and spread the love.

Invite your friends and peers to CoJam directly by email, message, or a post on Facebook!

title: TELL US WHAT TO ADD OR FIX
text:
As a CoJam pioneer, you will be shaping this app with every comment and feedback you give. We placed an instant feedback button in the settings for you. 

Also, tap the “Ask for help” button and we’ll reach out to you shortly to give you 1-on-1 support with any issues.
